name: Flippin
description:
FLIPPIN CRAZY AND FLIPPIN AWESOME
Flip the level upside down and downside up to overcome obstacles and complete levels. Looks easy? It is not. Get it for free and have fun!

CONTROLS
- Swipe to flip upside down or downside up
- Rotate to move left or right
- Tap to jump

WALLS
- Black walls are solid
- Yellow walls fall when the ball touches
- Red walls burn like fire
- Blue walls are hard like ice (ball bounces high and slides)
